testCases.content: Verify that user can successfully login with valid credentials and access the dashboard
testCases.contextUsed: User authentication flow and dashboard access requirements

testCases.content: Test that the system handles maximum concurrent users limit as specified in licensing agreement
testCases.contextUsed: Software licensing terms specify maximum 500 concurrent users

testCases.content: Validate GDPR compliance when user requests data deletion
testCases.contextUsed: GDPR Article 17 - Right to erasure requirements

testCases.content: Test edge case: What happens when session expires during file upload
Verify API integration handles authentication correctly with external HR systems
testCases.contextUsed: External HR system integration requires OAuth 2.0 authentication flow
